comment.author: 15937237@N00
comment._content: Based on the location of the Empire State Building in the background this can't be the Williamsburg Bridge as it is located south of 34th Street. This would be the 59th Street-Queensboro Bridge. The twin buildings in front of the Empire State Building are at 49th Street and First Avenue.

comment.author: 21598829@N00
comment._content: Stu_Jo is correct, I agree. I am a NYC professional location scout, it is my job to know these things!
